### 条件语句

条件语句只在条件的值不等于零时才会执行一组语句。

### 示例

[在MathStudio中浏览](http://mathstud.io/?input[0]&input[1]=eCUzRDIlMEFpZiUyMHglM0QlM0QxJTIwcmV0dXJuJTIwJTIyJUU0JUI4JTgwJTIyJTBBJTIwaWYlMjB4JTNEJTNEMiUyMHJldHVybiUyMCUyMiVFNCVCQSU4QyUyMiUwQSUyMCUyMGlmJTIweCUzRCUzRDMlMjByZXR1cm4lMjAlMjIlRTQlQjglODklMjIlMEElMjAlMjAlMjByZXR1cm4lMjAlMjIlRTYlOUMlQUElRTclOUYlQTUlRTYlOTUlQjAlMjI%3D)

> ```math
> temperature = 90
> if temperature <= 32
>   return "太冷了，加条毛衣吧"
> else if temperature >= 86
>   return "真的很热，记得戴太阳镜"
> else
>   return "不是很冷，穿T恤就行"
> end
> ```
>
> ***真的很热，记得戴太阳镜***

### If-Return 语句

> ```math
> x=2
> if x==1 return "一"
> if x==2 return "二"
> if x==3 return "三"
> return "未知数"
> ```
>
> ***二***

### 相关语句

[If](../I/If), [Else If](../E/ElseIf)
